definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: trample (NH id.; J Aram. [[רְמַס]]; cf. perh. Syr. rbas, Ar. rafasa, kick (Ba:ES 33 Kö:ii. 196); ramasa is bury, and conceal grave);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. ´[[וְר]]: Mic 5:7; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְמׂס]] Ez Eze 26:11, Ps 7:6, [[יִרְמָס־]] Is 41:25, sf. [[וַיִּרְמְסֶנׇּה]] 2Ki 9:33, etc.; Imv. fs. [[רִמְסִי]] Na 3:14; Inf. cstr. [[רְמׂס]] Is 1:12; Pt. [[רׂמֵס]] Is 16:4;—trample, of men, c. acc. [[חֲחֵרָָי]] Is 1:12, [[חוּחוֹת]] Ez Eze 26:11 (by horses’ hoofs), [[טִיט]] Eze 41:25 (in sim.), cf. [[בַחׂמֶר]] ´[[ר]]: Na 3:14, acc. [[מִרְעֶה]] Ez Eze 34:18 (in fig.); trample down, acc. pers., anim., vel rei, 2Ki 7:17, 2Ki 7:20, so (by horses’ hoofs) 2Ki 9:33, [[לָאָרֶץ חַיׇּי֫]] ´[[יִר]]: Ps 7:6; Ps 91:13 (‖[[תִּדְרׂח ]]); subj. ´[[י]]: Is 63:13 (fig.; +[[דָּרַח]]), subj. [[רֶנֶל]] Is 26:6; subj. beast 2Ki 14:9 (allegory) = 2Ch 25:18, Da 8:7 (vision), of horn, v:Da 8:10; abs. of lion, [[וְטָרַף]] ´[[וְר]]: Mic 5:7 (sim.); pt. as subst. coll. tramplers (i.e. devastators) Is 16:4.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be trampled, Impf. 3 fpl. [[בְּרַגֶלַיִם תֵּרָמַָסְנׇה]] Is 28:3 (on subj. cf. Di Du Che:Hpt Kö:i. 183).
